p: The DFT calculations on [ML14·H 2O] (Cu 2+, Mn 2+, and Fe 3+) were carried out with the Gaussian 09 program [ 20]. The long-range corrected hybrid density functional with damped atom–atom dispersion corrections wB97XD [ 21] was used together with the LANL2MB relativistic corrected pseudopotentials and basis sets [ 22, 23] for the metal atoms and the 6-31G (d,p) Gaussian basis set for the H 2L14 macrocycle. The polarizable continuum model (PCM) [ 24, 25] was used to include water as solvent.
